member.name: T:iText.License.Validators.AbstractLicenseKeyValidator
member.summary: Abstract validator class that implements common validation logic shared between itext5 and itext7 validators

member.summary: Map to store the product entries from a loaded license

member.name: M:iText.License.Validators.AbstractLicenseKeyValidator.IsTrial
member.summary: Check if a trial license is loaded.
member.remarks: Check if a trial license is loaded. Note: this method return true if a valid trial license is loaded. It returns false in all other case: commercial license, loadedLicenseExpired license, invalid license, no license loaded, ...
member.returns: true, if a valid trial license is loaded.

member.name: M:iText.License.Validators.AbstractLicenseKeyValidator.IsExpirationDatePassed(System.String)
member.summary: Parses the date string according to internal parser and check if the current date has passed the passed date In case of a parser exception it will return true
member.returns: True if the passed date is in the past or if a parser exception occured. False otherwise

member.name: T:iText.License.Validators.ILicenseKeyValidator
member.remarks: Validator interface for License keys. A Validator is responsible for the actual validation logic given the DOM-representation of a license file. It also stores loaded license, retrieves the info from it and validates single project of the license.

member.name: M:iText.License.Validators.ILicenseKeyValidator.LoadLicense(System.Xml.XmlElement)
member.summary: Load and Validate the license file represented by passed DOM tree.
member.remarks: Load and Validate the license file represented by passed DOM tree. Will update the state of LicenseKey if the license is valid
member.param: root node of the license key file representation

member.name: T:iTextSharp.license.LicenseKey
member.summary: This class acts as a delegate to its iText7 counterpart.
member.remarks: This class acts as a delegate to its iText7 counterpart. This class is only here to ensure minimal effort is needed when switching from the old LicenseKeyLibrary to the new one.
